verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: 'm] [ARG2: a financial planner] and there are 6 simple principles i follow when i invest my own money there are thousands of choices and an almost limitless amount of information to sort through one financial planner uses six main principles to guide his personal investments it impossible to find the perfect mix so sometimes good enough is good enough vanguard dave swensen us admiral
